pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:6.5: “Yampi mayaṃ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ na gacchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:11.3: Ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchissāmīti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
